posts.post_title: WANTED: 1887 N28's, N29's & N162's in G-VG
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tom Botticelli
If anyone has any of these Baseball cards in F-VG condition, and they would like to sell please contact me at tbotticell@aol.com.  The players I need are:

N28: Anson, Clarkson, Comiskey, Kelly, Ward

N29: Fogarty, Getzin, Morrell

N162: All

Thanks,

Tom
